Package Controller

Class CRUDCustomerBooking

java.lang.Object
Controller.CRUDCustomerBooking
public class CRUDCustomerBooking extends Object
A class of CRUD operations on the Booking.dat file Calls RWController to read and write data into .dat file
Since:
2022-11-01
Version:
1.0

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    initialise()
    This method intialises the .dat files and place all of them in runtime during execution of the java file
    static void
    readBookingList()
    This method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfBookings ArrayList.
    static ArrayList<Booking>
    retrieveBookingList()
    This method gets the ArrayList<Booking> previously being created in the readBookingList() function
    static void
    updateBookingList()
    This method updates/overwrites the Booking.dat file.

  • Constructor Details

    • CRUDCustomerBooking

      public CRUDCustomerBooking()

  • Method Details

    • initialise

      public static boolean initialise()
      This method intialises the .dat files and place all of them in runtime during execution of the java file
      Returns:
      boolean true to denote all the .dat files are properly read

    • readBookingList

      public static void readBookingList() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfBookings ArrayList. THIS READ FUNCTION HAS TO BE USED EVERYTIME THE PROGRAMME STARTS
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • retrieveBookingList

      public static ArrayList<Booking> retrieveBookingList()
      This method gets the ArrayList<Booking> previously being created in the readBookingList() function
      Returns:
      ArrayList

    • updateBookingList

      public static void updateBookingList() throws IOException
      This method updates/overwrites the Booking.dat file.
      Throws:
      IOException
